snippet: Nearly 75 percent of Syria’s known chemical arms material has been destroyed, the international organization responsible for policing a treaty banning the munitions announced Thursday.
abstract: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons announces that nearly 75 percent of Syria’s known chemical arms material has been destroyed.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 75 percent of Syria’s known chemical arms material has been destroyed, the international organization responsible for policing a treaty banning the munitions announced Thursday.

keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
keywords.name: organizations
